channel.title: CVE Feed for Palo Alto Networks -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Palo Alto Networks -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-3386|2024-06-07T15:13:59.508Z -- palo%20alto%20networks -- pan-os
item.description: An incorrect string comparison vulnerability in Palo Alto Networks PAN-OS software prevents Predefined Decryption Exclusions from functioning as intended. This can cause traffic destined for domains that are not specified in Predefined Decryption Exclusions to be unintentionally excluded from decryption.

item.title: CVE-2024-2431|2024-03-13T17:51:17.735Z -- palo%20alto%20networks -- globalprotect%20app
item.description: An issue in the Palo Alto Networks GlobalProtect app enables a non-privileged user to disable the GlobalProtect app in configurations that allow a user to disable GlobalProtect with a passcode.
